H2.text: who cracked the enigma code in world war 2. Hugh Alexander

H3.text: who cracked the enigma code in world war 2. Turing

A4.text: He led Hut 8, the section responsible for German naval cryptanalysis.

A5.text: He played a crucial role in cracking intercepted messages that enabled the Allies to defeat the Axis powers in the Battle of the Atlantic and other engagements.
